item.title: Feedback to Columbia Magazine on the Cyberwarfare article
item.description: I have been reading Columbia Magazine for years but this is the first time I have written a feedback to its editor. It was my reaction to a rather interesting interview with Jason Healy, a senior researcher Scholar at Columbia | SIPA (where I spent many hours studying in its library during my undergrad years). The entire interview is here. My response to the article: Your interview with Jason Healey couldn’t be more timely and spot on.
